channel.title: Project-Valiance *Need Staff / Coders*
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][U][SIZE=5]Welcome To Project-Valiance![/SIZE][/U][/B][/CENTER]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Download links[/SIZE][/U][/B] [url=http://uppit.com/ymwo73michkf/Project-Valiance.jar]http://uppit.com/ymwo73michkf/Project-Valiance.jar[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?7jn3kupsgfra38o]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?7jn3kupsgfra38o[/url]
[U][B][SIZE=4]Forums[/SIZE][/B][/U] [url=http://www.Project-Valiance.com]www.Project-Valiance.com[/url]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Server Features - [/SIZE][/U][/B] Fully working clan chat - Ranks, crowns, settings ect.. Fully working voting Flawless Switching and Hybriding Active and friendly community Frequent Updates New items such as torva with working effects Quick curses/prayers - including saving Many, many more features!
[B][U][SIZE=4]Why You should play Project-Valiance -[/SIZE][/U][/B] - A very good question.. But a very simple answer which is, Project-Valiance cares about it's players, it cares about it's economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do everything we possible can to ensure that the players of Project-Valiance enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!
- The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on Project-Valiance on the update-log on the forums. Project-Valiance focuses on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of game-play that we know players enjoy! We are not like other servers which are ignorant to there players and just ignores there opinions and even ignores there players when they talk to them.. I have played over 50 servers over the past 4 years and have watched very carefully how the best servers are ran and also how the bad servers are ran, I have learnt there mistakes and adapted to how the best servers are ran which is why Project-Valiance is the place for you
[B][U][SIZE=4]Pictures[/SIZE][/U][/B] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/fyd7d1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2yvw0fn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/35d4tnn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/350q9zs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/117hiiv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2exugrr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/690sjb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/261lus2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ebc21j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/122ixki.png[/img]

www.Project-Valiance.com

[SIZE=4]Server Features - [/SIZE]
Fully working clan chat - Ranks, crowns, settings ect…
Fully working voting
Flawless Switching and Hybriding
Active and friendly community
Frequent Updates
New items such as torva with working effects
Quick curses/prayers - including saving
Many, many more features!

[SIZE=4]Why You should play Project-Valiance -[/SIZE]

  • A very good question… But a very simple answer which is, Project-Valiance cares about it’s players, it cares about it’s economy, it cares about how the server is ran and what the players suggest and what they want. We do everything we possible can to ensure that the players of Project-Valiance enjoy playing the game and get the most friendly, fun and enjoyable game play they can!

  • The server does frequent and daily updates almost every day, you can view all/most of the updates that happen on Project-Valiance on the update-log on the forums. Project-Valiance focuses on every players enjoyment, we have every aspect of game-play that we know players enjoy! We are not like other servers which are ignorant to there players and just ignores there opinions and even ignores there players when they talk to them… I have played over 50 servers over the past 4 years and have watched very carefully how the best servers are ran and also how the bad servers are ran, I have learnt there mistakes and adapted to how the best servers are ran which is why Project-Valiance is the place for you
